tool_description: Sends emails through configured email service providers with delivery tracking and retry capabilities.
error_messages: Invalid recipient email: Recipient email address format is invalid
Invalid sender email: Sender email address format is invalid
Empty content: Both HTML and text content cannot be empty
Invalid priority: Priority must be one of [low, normal, high]
Delivery failed: Email could not be delivered due to service error
Recipient blocked: Email address is on the blocked/unsubscribed list
usage: Provide recipient_email, subject_line, html_content, and text_content. Optionally specify sender_email and priority. The tool attempts delivery and returns status information.

delivery_id.description: Unique identifier for this delivery attempt

delivery_status.description: Status of delivery: sent, failed, queued, bounced
